reviews.review: Overall the game as a whole is enjoyable and one of the few games where I feel invested enough that as I play the killer I'll be leaning in towards the screen as I try to attack. However, the amount of DLC incorperated into the game does make an aspect of it a little lack luster as you'll find yourself playing both with and against characters you don't have access to. All in all it is still i game I reccomend

Great game; Dev's constantly balancing :) it can be easy to get too into the game and get fired up about changes, but lets not forget how fun this thing is. 8/10 at least <3

This is fun, its like Evolve but less about taking down a monster and more about NOT DYING.
Unless you're the killer, then you hunt people down and kill them like the degenerates they are.

People complain about camping all the time, but if your allies / you are smart you should realize that ( camping  as the boss ) you are giving up free generators.


besides the longer / more someone is put on a hook the faster they start to die. so losing him won't be that bad as long as you catch him again.
Muy Buen Juego de Survival Horror 10/10

不说了，对萌新来说这游戏确实不友好，但是多玩几次，你会发现这游戏很有意思，不仅在于和屠夫之间的博弈，还有队友之间的合作，翻箱子翻到好东西的惊喜。总之，支持入坑。
最后，我tm要吐槽这个匹配机制，我一个20段的萌新为什么会匹配到三个1段人皇和一个1段屠皇？

一个设计很好的游戏，但无奈随着游戏的深入人太蛇皮，导致屠夫各种变态增强。我们自己是有一定责任（太厉害了怪我们么）这也只是游戏的进程。游戏还有奇奇怪怪的bug，刷道具，延迟等等问题 。
刚玩这游戏没有任何技能却总能和4技能的人一起，不熟悉套路被屠夫各种抓。
诶啊。

Everytime me and my friend try to find a lobby, we get seperated from our team and thrown back into a lobby or a game without each other!

PLEASE FIX THESE ISSUES OR MY REVIEW STAYS NEGATIVE!

Readjusted review, again. Last halloween really put the spotlight on this companies increased focus on greed over substance. Each drop of DLC comes with a tidal wave of bugs, despite no a PTB. A removal of features, a increase of monetary sources, the continuous lack of respect for the consumers time. This game is a money sink, and a major time sink. My only hope is this little genre they have carved for themselves soon gets a proper competitor, rather than the continuous monopoly this company holds over the genre.

Nonostante le mie 149.6 ore devo dire che il gioco e si di per se bello, ma purtroppo riscontra molti e dico MOLTI problemi alquanto fastidiosi.

Parto subito dal primo punto.
Secondo me gli sviluppatori di questo gioco, non ne hanno proprio mezza di ottimizzare questo gioco come si deve.. Non è per nulla possibile che mentre gioco una partita vado a 60 FPS  a impostazioni alte e neanche 5 minuti dopo mi cala a 30 mettendomi casualmente le impostazioni grafiche a basso. Sfanculando praticamente la mia grafica di gioco.

Secondo punto: 
Il problema di cui si discute per la maggiore ovvero il matchmaking di sto cazzo!!
Non è possibile che voglio fare una partita con altri 3 miei amici da survival e praticamente devo aspettare come minimo 1 ora perchè non trova killer. E anche se dio e così gentile da fare il miracolo di trovare una lobby, va comunque a finire che il killer si caga addosso perchè vede 4 premade e quitta facendoci aspettare cosi un altra stra cazzo di ora per nulla. Che poi magari va a finire che fai una partita da soli 5 minuti perchè il killer simpatico ti facecampera e ti rovina la partita..
O ancora meglio, dato che le partite le Hosta il killer, c'è la possibilità che lagga talmente tanto che crasha e tu da povero survival ignaro perdi comunque punti e sopratutto gli oggetti in partita..

Terzo punto:
I BUG!
Nonostante non ce ne siano troppi, quei pochi che ci sono, danno veramente fastidio. Quelli più famosi e riscontrati sono che delle volte il killer può colpirti sfruttando dei wall glitch totalmente casuali, oppure che ti blocchi in mezzo a dei pallet che tiri giù in modo a caso.

E questi di per se sono i punti più fastidiosi che il gioco ha da offrirci, c'è ne sono tanti altri ma poi la lista diventerebbe troppo lunga.

Ma nonostante tutto, vorrei spezzare una lancia a favore del gioco dicendo che nonostante bug e stronzate varie, il gioco se funzionasse bene sa anche divertire e intrattenere come si deve, perchè l'idea di per se è abbastanza originale. 
Giocato con gli amici puo far uscire le peggio cavolate e le miglior risate della vostra vita. Ma purtroppo se gli sviluppatori non si decidono di svegliarsi un attimo, io sono sicuro che l'utenza su DbD andrà a farsi fottere presto.
E ciò sarebbe un vero peccato, perchè ha molto potenziale da offrire ma uno staff dietro che non ha capito nulla dalla vita.

In fine voglio dire che questo gioco nonostante tutto lo consiglio, perchè nel bene o nel male lo continuano ad aggiornare(e spero che non lo facciano morire questo progetto). Però possibilmente non prendetelo a prezzo pieno, perchè potreste rimanerne frustrati dal fatto che per la maggior parte del tempo la passerete a girarvi i pollici per molti minuti nella lobby.
zoinks saggy, looks like poopy

I was a Rank 1 Survivor and Killer, but I have uninstalled Dead By Daylight, a game that I had invested 355 hours in. I used to stream this game every day because I had fun and saw the game's potential. Then the bugs, exploits, and unbalanced Killers came. I gave the devs the benefit of the doubt that they would patch their game in a timely fashion, but they cared more about designing and releasing new cosmetic DLC, rather than making a bug-free, balanced multiplayer experience.

Behaviour Interactive is killing their game, and the community has every right to be toxic about it.
Веселая и интересная игра)

Отличная игра для веселой компании из 5 человек или для того, что бы потрепать свои нервы сольно.
Надеюсь, что разрабы соберутся с силами и пофиксят баги, не забывая выпускать новые интересные дополнения)

I really enjoy playing this, Although the community has died down a bit but that isn't a bad thing it was mostly the super salty and exploitatious part of the community, so it got better, I love playing this and will continue to do so, I have not run into any of these "bugs" as of yet so I have no opinion on the current "problems" with the game others seem to be having, I have a feeling these people calling it buggy and glitchy may also be apart of the salt survivor/ killer crowd that has decided to leave the game because the developers decided to balance the survivors and killers to a point where it is fair for both sides where in realit they want one side better than the other. But I give this game an 8/10, I highly recommend it and at the time of this review it is on sale 40% off so super worth buying, if you don't like it then utilize the steam refund before you play it for 2 hours see how you like it.

Das Spiel ist echt nicht mehr empfehlenswert... Früher hat es sehr schnell im Freundemodus geladen, heute muss man mindestens 20 bis 30 Minuten warten, um überhaupt eine Lobby zu finden. Meistens hat man dann das Glück, dass man wieder raus gekickt wird und von vorne starten kann. Sehr schade eigentlich... Dann kommt dazu das man nurnoch wenig Punkte bekommt. Sonst hat man immer mindestens 15000 Blutpunkte bekommen, auch wenn man gestorben ist aber jetzt kriegt man bei einer verlorenen Runde nurnoch 5000! Das ist nichts, weil mit 5000 Blutpunkten kommt man im Blutnetz nicht weit... Seitdem jetzt auch Freddy dabei ist, denkt man sich warum DBD nicht auch Cheater spielen lässt, weil man keine Chance mehr hat zu gewinnen...

Heya,
First: This is a fully released game. No early access. Keep that in mind.
I really like this game, I do. The idea and the gameplay as intended is compelling.
It is what evolve should've been. And a lot of the reviews that complain about long lobby waiting times are literally jack sh*t. They only wait so long, because they absolutely want to play survivors. Since this is a p2p connection game, the killer hosts the game. So if there are 20.000 survisors and only 100 killers in the queue, the survivors will have to either wait, or switch to killer. I play the kiler mostly and my games are full and running in under 3 minutes.
BUT, why I gave it a thumbs down has the following reasons:
Matchmaking sucks. No really. You cannot see the rank of your opponents (I guess due to the reason that the devs rather wanted to mask the bug, than to fix it). I mostly run against survivors where I can exactly tell that they are a lot higher level than me (by the items they carry or the perks they have). That is a big no-no in my book.
Second big reason: Spawn is a bitch. You can easily spawn in the game with the killer's breath down your neck already.
Another big no-no: No mouse settings. You will not be able to adjust your mouse acceleration/sensitivity in this game. Unless you have a mouse (like me) that has buttons for the dpi, you are f*cked. Who the hell releases a PC game with no mouse settings?
And on the long run playing as the killer is no fun, since you have to deal with rank 1 survivors taunting you after a game as a rank 18 killer, due to the sh*tty match making system. Problem here is: There is no real reason to play the killer. You are already in a big disadvantage. There is no incentive. You p*ss off all the killers, there will be no more games, since they are the p2p hosts.
EDIT: Oh, and as far as the free items (due to having left4dead2, etc) are concerned: Don't bother. They are not usable in your steam inventory. Greyed out items with no options. No way to activate them.
Devs: Pretty good Job so Far. ^^

I played this game a lot but the more they update it the more I hate it. I finally stopped playing. If they introduced servers to reduce lag and disconnecting issues, this game would be a lot better. Every third game I play I get randomly disconnected. If you read the forums and reddit, this is a problem many people are facing.

Secondly, this game breeds anger. Not that other games don't (counter strike cough cough). If you get caught, and you will, you'll be camped. What's camping? The killer is so close to the hook that nobody can save you. So you'll spend a minute staring at the screen and then furiously pressing space bar. Then game over. If you are playing killer, you'll spend 5 minutes looking for the last guy after the exit gates are open only to find him in a locker in the basement, or sitting at an exit gate t-bagging.

They made the killer very hard to escape which they think makes the game scary, but it's not scary at all. Devs promise updates that will improve the game then don't deliver for months. At this point, I would advise not to buy unless it's like 7 dollars or something.

I have played this game for what I believe is quite a big amount of hours now and I absolutely love it.
However, I play a lot with my friends, and we are often more than 5 people who therefor can't play together. Therefor I would like you to make it so that you can play as more than 5 people in Kill Your Friends. Aslong as you are playing with friends and not online it can't harm to make everyone able to join, and as i have seen in the past when the game was bugged it is pretty easy to balance the game around a 1v5 or 1v6 not to mention extra killers. I know that it is easy to do this and I believe that it would make a larger part of your community happy to be able to play with custom rulesets like this.

LEFT FOR DEADコラボのセール時に購入。感想をば。
低いランク帯でのお話ですが参考になれば。
このゲームはサバイバーと鬼に別れて隠れ鬼ごっこをするゲームです。
最初は日頃のストレス発散を兼ねて鬼側でプレイ！
しかしながら、上級者のお兄さん方や○RENサバイバーにグリッチ行為で
煽られストレスを解消するどころか、寧ろ増える一方でした。
一方でサーバーを変えたりプレイ時間を変えれば
まともなプレイヤーの方も多い為、非常に精神面的にどちら側でも楽しいです。
なので、購入の方は煽られたり、グリッチ行為を行われたら回線をすぐに切って次に行きましょう。
是非このゲームで鬼側でのストレス発散、サバイバー側のスリルを味わってみてください！
